metadata.title: CVE-2023-1380 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high
metadata.description:
A slab-out-of-bound read problem was found in brcmf_get_assoc_ies indrivers/net/wireless/broadcom/brcm80211/brcmfmac/cfg80211.c in the LinuxKernel. This issue could occur when assoc_info->req_len data is bigger thanthe size of the buffer, defined as WL_EXTRA_BUF_MAX, leading to a denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-23-generic - 6.2.0-23.23
linux-image-6.2.0-23-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-23-generic - 6.2.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-23-generic-64k - 6.2.0-23.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1006-kvm - 6.2.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-aws - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-azure - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1007-gcp - 6.2.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-ibm - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-oracle - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1006-raspi - 6.2.0-1006.8
linux-image-6.2.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1006.8
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1002-starfive - 6.2.0-1002.2
No subscription required
